de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.mapscaleresolver

Class LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.mapscaleresolver.MinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.mapscaleresolver.LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractMapScaleResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SectionMapScaleResolver

    public class LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver
extends MinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver
    This MapScaleResolver is an extension to the MinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver. If the more than x % of the minimum boundary box is not shown (= is cut away) the boundary box can be exceeded The maximumCut serves as the lower limit

      • Fields inherited from class de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.mapscaleresolver.MinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver

      • LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver

        public LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver(int visibleTilesX,
                                      int visibleTilesY,
                                      float maximumCutPrecentage)
        Creates a new LimitedMinimumBoundaryMapScaleResolver
        Parameters:
        visibleTilesX - the width of the boundary box
        visibleTilesY - the height of the boundary box
        maximumCutPrecentage - the maximum amount of "cut away" tiles
